methods.doc:
Converts Integer, Float or String to a String with currency sign and delimiters.
  number_to_currency(1234567890.506)
  # => "$1,234,567,890.51"

  number_to_currency(-1234567890.50)
  # => "-$1,234,567,890.50"

  number_to_currency(1234567890.50, unit: "&pound")
  # => "&pound1,234,567,890.50"
  
  number_to_currency(1234567890.50, unit: "£", separator: ",", delimiter: "")
  # => "£1234567890,50"

args.type: Ksplat[:format? => String, :precision? => Integer, :unit? => String, :negative_format? => String, :separator? => String, :delimiter? => String, :significant? => Bool, :strip_insignificant_zeros? => Bool, :round_mode? => Or[up, down, truncate, half_up, default, half_down, half_even, banker, ceiling, floor]]
